statements: SELECT * FROM dna_access_controls
SELECT dna_data FROM dna_access_controls WHERE id = 1
SELECT authorized_personnel, dna_data FROM dna_access_controls WHERE authorized_personnel = 'John Doe'
SELECT id, dna_data, authorized_personnel FROM dna_access_controls ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM dna_access_controls WHERE id > 10
SELECT id, dna_data, authorized_personnel FROM dna_access_controls WHERE id = 1
SELECT dna_data, authorized_personnel, id FROM dna_access_controls WHERE authorized_personnel = 'John Doe'
SELECT authorized_personnel, dna_data, id FROM dna_access_controls ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM dna_access_controls WHERE authorized_personnel LIKE 'A%'
SELECT id, dna_data FROM dna_access_controls WHERE dna_data IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM dna_data;
SELECT id, dna_sequence FROM dna_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT dna_sequence FROM dna_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM dna_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 7);
SELECT id, dna_sequence FROM dna_data WHERE dna_sequence LIKE '%ACGT%';
SELECT * FROM dna_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT dna_sequence FROM dna_data WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, dna_sequence FROM dna_data JOIN access_controls ON dna_data.id = access_controls.user_id WHERE access_controls.access_level = 'admin';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM dna_data;
SELECT * FROM dna_data WHERE dna_sequence LIKE '%ATG%' AND id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM access_controls WHERE access_level = 'guest');
SELECT * FROM AccessControls WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT id, user_id FROM DNAData ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM AuthorizationLogs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT id, user_id, action FROM AuthorizationLogs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY log_timestamp LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM AccessControls JOIN DNAData ON AccessControls.user_id = DNAData.owner_id;
SELECT * FROM AccessControls WHERE role='admin';
SELECT id, role FROM AccessControls WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT * FROM DNAData WHERE id=1;
SELECT owner_id, dna_sequence FROM DNAData ORDER BY owner_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, log_timestamp FROM AuthorizationLogs WHERE user_id=2 AND action='login' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT permission_name FROM Permissions WHERE permission_id = 1;
SELECT dna_sequence FROM DNAData WHERE owner_id = 1001;
SELECT id, user_id, permission FROM AccessControls ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM AccessControls WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT permission FROM AccessControls WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM DNAData WHERE owner_id = 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission FROM AccessControls WHERE permission LIKE 'write%';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE role = 'scientist';
SELECT * FROM authorized_personnel;
SELECT log_id, accessed_table, access_date FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_date DESC;
SELECT dna_id, dna_sequence FROM dna_data WHERE dna_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM permission_roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT personnel_id, accessed_table FROM access_logs WHERE access_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM authorized_personnel WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT name, role FROM authorized_personnel ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT dna_sequence FROM dna_data WHERE LENGTH(dna_sequence) > 1000;
SELECT a.name, p.role_name FROM authorized_personnel a JOIN permission_roles p ON a.role = p.role_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM access_logs WHERE access_date >= '2022-01-01';
